divs: Sighting DetailsI had just woke up before daybreak and was headed south down the Interstate When I saw something starting over the horizion on the drivers side. I pulled over to the side of the road to watch. It was a wing shape craft that was well over 3 city blocks wide and over a city block thick. It was floatig about 300 feet in the air and moving very,very slow toward me. There was a small craft to my left in front of it and shaped like it. There was no sound and no engines only 4 large circles with what looked like large diamonds in them on each wing and a smaller one on the nose. I have never told anyone because there was no one to tell at that time
Summary: I was driving a !8 Wheeler down the Interstate going south when I saw it comming over the Horizion
